stadium.name: Fletchings Field
stadium.description: Fletchings Field was the first formal Troll Ball stadium in Warden lands. The design balances wood and stone, with arrowhead motifs and banners representing each region under Warden protection. The field includes trees, gully's and other obstacle placements, changed each match by local druids and terrain crafters.

stats.pregame_ritual: Going over the game plan drawn in the dirt with the team captain.
Leading the team in a synchronized chant that slowly gets louder.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Giving the Trollball a heroic backstory before each game.
Headbutting their own team's goal post (gently).
Sticking a specific type of feather in their helmet's plume.
Burying their helmet in the ground and then digging it back up.
Reading their own fortune in a scattering of knuckle bones.
Wearing a specific, garishly colored pair of undergarments.
Always putting on their left gauntlet before their right.

stadium.name: The Unruly Yard
stadium.description: A field in the center of the city's most rebellious district. The stadium is covered in graffiti, the crowd is hostile, and riots are a common post-game (and mid-game) event.

stats.pregame_ritual: Drinking a shot of hot gravy from a dented tin cup.
Arranging their gear in a perfect, aesthetically pleasing spiral.
Testing the heft of their weapon with a series of slow, deliberate swings.
Kissing the Trollball on its stitched 'nose'.
Reviewing hand signals for secret plays.
Refusing to step on any lines on the field before the whistle blows.
Telling a terrible joke to the Trollball to 'loosen it up'.
Dipping their hands in a bucket of ice-cold well water.
Slapping their own helmet until their ears ring.
Singing a sea shanty completely out of tune.
Reciting a short, epic poem about a past victory.

preGame:
# ‚öæ HELLO OSTERRA! GAME THREE IS ON THE AIR! ‚öæ

Well, hello there, you beautiful, bloodthirsty bunch! Nok the Corrupter here, coming to you live from the booth at Fletchings Field! We are in the thick of it now, folks! The Grand Finals series is tied up at one win apiece, and this Game Three is the swing vote that could tip the scales toward destiny! The druids are currently out on the field whispering to the roots, and let me tell you, that Shifting Terrain is already looking like a maze designed by a drunken minotaur! üå≥

I just took a gander at the Oak & Onslaught dugout, and those 'heroes' are up to their usual shenanigans! Milt Casady is leading a synchronized chant that‚Äôs currently louder than a banshee in a library, while Wynnie Faina and Normi Glaudia are diligently putting their boots on the wrong feet! Tactical brilliance or just plain silly? You be the judge! Meanwhile, Hole Bowerman is knee-deep in a hole, burying her helmet to appease the dirt spirits. I hope the spirits like the taste of cheap steel! üå∞

But look at those rebels from New Monteforte! The Chaos Creatures aren't here for a picnic! Lian Denton is currently chugging a tin cup of steaming hot gravy‚Äîthat‚Äôs the kind of high-octane fuel that turns a healer into a herald of havoc! And Boulanger Procto is meticulously arranging his gear in a perfect, aesthetically pleasing spiral. It‚Äôs almost a shame it‚Äôs about to be covered in Warden blood and mud! üåÄ

The Open Bar is officially flowing, and the Warden fans are already swaying like the trees! Will Sir Randy and his fancy-pants rangers defend their home turf, or will the Chaos Creatures turn this botanical garden into a graveyard? My demonic heart is pitter-pattering for the carnage! Let‚Äôs play Trollball! üî•üèà
postGame:
# üèÜ A CARNAGE CATHEDRAL AT FLETCHINGS FIELD! üèÜ

Holy Mackerel, sports fans! You are listening to the sweet, gravelly voice of Nok the Corrupter, and my demonic heart is practically singing after that display of sheer, unadulterated violence! The New Monteforte Chaos Creatures didn't just win; they delivered a masterclass in destruction, crushing the Warden favorites Oak & Onslaught with a staggering score of 9 to 2! The series lead is now 2-1 for the rebels, and the 'heroes' are looking more like garden trimmings! üèüÔ∏è‚ú®

The match kicked off with Alben Diantha snatching the troll head, and the Chaos Creatures immediately showed they weren't interested in a polite game of catch. Fogel Raynold, looking like a man possessed, broke through the defensive line and DUNKS the ball into the goal! A beautiful 1-point start that silenced the feathered caps in the front row faster than a warlock with a sore throat! üèÄ

But the Monteforte squad was just getting warmed up! Wolbrom Ariella‚Äîfresh from singing a sea shanty that was mercifully drowned out by the crowd‚Äîstepped up to Center Field and launched a prayer! SWISH! A massive 2-point Shoot that put the Creatures up by 3 before the Wardens could even fix their boots! It was a sniper's delight that left the druids scratching their heads! üéØüò±

Oak & Onslaught tried to fire back with some of that 'heroic' grit. Wynnie Faina, clearly tired of the Chaos momentum, delivered a bone-rattling tackle to Fogel Raynold, sending the Monteforte star straight to the injury list! You could hear the crunch from the VIP box! My goodness, the medical staff is earning their gold tonight! üöëüí•

Just when it looked like the Wardens might mount a comeback, Normi Glaudia managed a clutch interception, allowing Millham Evangeline to find some space. Millham launched a long-range bomb from Center Field‚ÄîBOOM! A 2-point Shoot for the home team! It brought the score to 3-2 and for a fleeting moment, the 'heroes' thought they had a chance! üèÄ‚ú®

Then came halftime, and let me tell you, the Open Bar was the real MVP for the fans. Half the spectators are so pickled they think they're at a wedding! But the Chaos Creatures used the break to sharpen their blades. While Ahron Latashia was busy stitching Warden limbs back on, the Monteforte rebels were drinking more gravy and preparing for a literal slaughter! üç∫üè•

The second half was a symphony of stretchers! Affra Yanaton tried to set the tone by leveling Wolbrom Ariella, but the Chaos Creatures weren't intimidated. Fogel Raynold returned from the healers with a vengeance, immediately flattening Ema Ulrick! The back-and-forth brutality was so beautiful it almost brought a tear to my eye! ü¶¥

The score then exploded! Gabriele Klehm, who spent the pre-game kissing the trollball's nose, launched a 2-pointer that sailed true! Not to be outdone, Tucker Hett decided to turn the game into a shooting gallery, launching two consecutive 2-point Shoots‚Äîone from Center Field and a final, back-breaking bomb from the Home Field! The scoreboard was spinning faster than a dizzy goblin! üéØü§ò

The hits just kept coming like a landslide! Milt Casady took out Placido Kora, but the Wardens were losing the war of attrition. Raouf Dragone, the trident-wielding poet, decided Symer Crissy had been on the field too long and sent her to the healers! Affra Yanaton managed to return the favor by leveling Raouf, but the damage was already done! üè•üî®

By the final whistle, Fletchings Field looked more like a hospital ward than a sports arena. The Chaos Creatures stood tall in the mud, celebrating a 9-2 blowout that has left the Warden economy‚Äîand Falric‚Äôs pride‚Äîin absolute shambles! If this is what 'heroism' looks like, I‚Äôll take the rebels any day of the week! üèÜ

The series stands at 2-1 for New Monteforte! One more win and they‚Äôll have the crown and the bragging rights to last an eternity! Will Sir Randy polish his fancy bow and find a miracle, or will the Chaos burn it all down in Game Four? I'm betting on the fire! üî•

This is Nok the Corrupter, signing off from a stadium full of drunk fans and very busy healers! Stay violent, Osterra! See you for the next one! ü§òüî•
